pr_title: Do not schedule NodeAgentContext if not waiting

timeline.message: Do not schedule new context unless already waiting for one

timeline.bodyText: This meant that if NA spent >1 HA tick, the context it eventually picked up on its next NA tick was >1 HA tick old?
timeline.author: hakonhall

replies.bodyText: No, NA would pick up the context set during the last HA tick.
replies.author: freva
